mapper.insert: insert into csr_library (bookcode, pdf_name, img_name, book_name, author, translator, publication_date, publisher, pages, isbn, location, memo, copies) values (#{bookcode}, #{pdf_name}, #{img_name}, #{book_name}, #{author}, #{translator}, #{publication_date}, #{publisher}, #{pages}, #{isbn}, #{location}, #{memo}, #{copies})
mapper.select: select * from csr_library order by id desc
